name: mike-henke-website
description: This is a personal portfolio website for Mike Henke, showcasing his skills, experience, and portfolio projects. The website is built using HTML and CSS, following specific design and coding guidelines.

scripts.build:prod: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production eleventy && npx pagefind --site _site --verbose
scripts.dev: npm run clean && eleventy && npx pagefind --site _site && eleventy --serve --watch

author: Mike Henke
